articles.title: Here’s Everything We Know So Far About Marvel’s Future
articles.description: For over a decade, Marvel Studios has made a habit of revealing its big plans for the future at San Diego Comic-Con's storied Hall H. And during Saturday's Marvel Studios panel, Kevin Feige set out to assure fans that, yes, there is a plan.

articles.title: China Launches One of 2 Lab Modules to Join Tiangong Space Station

articles.content:
BEIJING — China on Sunday launched one of two laboratory modules to complete its permanent orbiting space station.

articles.title: California Wildfire Burns Out of Control Near Yosemite
articles.description: A destructive wildfire near Yosemite National Park burned out of control Sunday and has grown into one of California's biggest blazes of the year, forcing thousands of residents to flee remote mountain communities.
